Module project.chenlin_17
Package project.chenlin_17.Views

Class Paddle

java.lang.Object
project.chenlin_17.Views.Paddle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Movable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ImagePaddle, RegularPaddle
abstract class Paddle extends Object implements Movable
This class contains the model for the paddle.
Version:
Version1.0
update: December 29th
Author:
Lin CHEN
Note
It contains changes from the awt to javafx.
It contains changes of class variables according to Bob's code convention.

    • Paddle

      public Paddle(javafx.geometry.Point2D ballPoint, int width, int height, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle container, int defMoveAmount)
      This constructor sets the basic parameter for the paddle.
      Parameters:
      ballPoint - paddle's start point
      width - defined paddle width
      height - defined paddle height
      container - defined paddle movement range
      defMoveAmount - defined movement
      Modified:

  • Method Details

    • makePaddleFace

      public abstract javafx.scene.shape.Shape makePaddleFace(int width, int height)
      This function gets the made paddle face.
      Parameters:
      width - paddle width
      height - paddle height
      Returns:
      paddleFace made with defined width and height
      Modified:
      Rectangle2D -> Shape
      Deleted:
      public Rectangle2D makeRectangle(int width,int height){}
      Note
      since paddle face can be different and should not be Rectangles only, therefore, it is reasonable to have multiple Shapes

    • impact

      public boolean impact(Ball b)
      This function simulates paddle's interaction with the ball.
      Parameters:
      b - ball
      Returns:
      whether the ball has hit the paddle

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      This function makes paddle view moves to left.

      This function makes paddle view moves to the right.
      Deleted:
      movRight(){} for readable function name

    • stop

      public void stop()
      This function simulates the paddle's stop status.

    • move

      public void move()
      This function defines paddle's whole movement and add in the stop status for the paddle when reach the bound.
      It calculates the latest paddle position.
      Specified by:
      move in interface Movable
      Note
      setLocation is not usable in javaFX's Point2D package

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(javafx.geometry.Point2D point)
      This function allows the paddle to move to a specific point.
      Specified by:
      moveTo in interface Movable
      Parameters:
      point - expected point
      Note
      setLocation is not usable in javaFX's Point2D package
